reviews.review: One of my favorite childhood games!
A history making game! It may be a first person shooter, but I'd also classify it as horror- the atmosphere of this game nearly makes me shit my pants.
20小时无作弊通关。还是简单模式，我已经不知道存档多少次了。真没想到20多年前的游戏居然这么难，还这么精彩流畅。FPS居然能玩出解密和剧情真的太棒了。还几天就可以晚上3了（VR版前传艾利克斯）

The fact that Steam is a thing tells you most of what I need to tell you about Half-Life.  It's better than its sequel, is what more I'll say, and don't think that's nostalgia; I first played it in 2016.
It's flippin Half Life!! What more has to be said!? I recommend you get this game as soon as you can.

バンドルで大量に付いてきたうちの1つ。

いまさらプレイするようなゲームではないと思うけど、
名作名作とみんなが言うのでサクッとプレイ。

当時は最高だったのかもしれないけど、まぁお察し。
後半は敵に苦労するというより、操作性で苦労。
戦死よりも墜落死のほうが遥かに多い。

いまからプレイするのはおすすめしませんが、
2も同じキャラが主人公らしいので、2とかやる前提なら1もプレイしてもいいと思います。

Франшиза Half Life многое время была для меня неизведаной (хоть я и запускал первые версии кс через неё).Спустя более чем 13 лет после того как я впервые её запустил я решил пройти сюжетку.И черт возьми как же ето было ох*енно.14 часов безпрерывного екшона , загадок и удивлений от геймплея и игры в целом.Стоит ли она своих денег? Скажу так , за 5$ я купил все игры линейки но если бы мне предложили потратить в два раза больше только за одну игру , я бы не колибался и купил.Настолько мне понравилась ета игра. 

P.S. да у меня 14 часов ,более 5 часов я играл без нета сидя в поезде.
The most amazing game on PC several years ago. Running it at 4K looks amazing.

Clasico de Pc.

Obligatorio de tener en la biblioteca.
Es gibt nichts zu sagen, was nicht schon gesagt wurde. Eines der legendärsten Videospiele aller Zeiten. 10/10
Söylenecek hiçbir şey yok bu HALF-LİFE

GLaDOS kept making jokes about Black Mesa and I got curious and couldn't help myself - I had to see why everyone said Half Life was so good. I played the Portal games years before ever touching Half Life. This has a similar feeling (even though it's completely different).

Because the game focuses on solving puzzles AND not getting killed, it holds up decades after it was originally released. Yes, it looks like a potato and the gameplay is worse than trying to pick up rocks with toothpicks, but the story is unique and compelling.

I'd recommend this to anyone who 10-15 hours to play an old puzzle-shooter. Over 20 years later, I'd say Half Life is incredibly relevant to anyone looking for a good story.

10/10
Holds up. It's a pretty fun game. I wish it was a bit shorter, but it was still very good

Excelente FPS Accion / Horror, el clasico de los clasicos....
EL PADRE DE LOS FPS, COLTA

Half Life offered an almost seamless progression from start to finish with no sudden teleports at the end of stages with just one exception.
  
The level of detail for behavior of aliens was absolutely stunning for that time. 

Same goes for the AI (though this isn't as fair since enemy AI was heavily scripted). 

Nowadays of course it's not anything new or special, since everyone else built upon the foundations of old games like Half Life 1. But still, it stood the test of time and is still fun to play nowadays.
Es un juego muy bueno, recuerdo que lo jugaba con mis compañeros, pero ahora al fin lo tengo legal
old but still very very good
no proste że polecam tą grę

Siempre he querido tener ese pequeño trofeo de pasarme Half Life al menos una vez en la vida. Y lo logré, más de 10 veces y una en Hard, en poco de 2hrs. Cualquiera puede hacerlo y en tan poco tiempo. Es una de las campañas de todos los videojuegos que más me encanta pasarme, un clásico, un viejo pero maravilloso videojuego.

Me encanta este juego desde que empece a jugarlo (por alli en 2007) de verdad marco mi infancia.

I have had the wonderful opportunity to play this game for the first time in VR using the Oculus Quest. It is an absolutely fantastic experience. I enjoyed it so much I have purchased and completed HL: Blue Shift and I am currently playing Opposing Force. What a time to be alive!

Juego atemporal que divierte como el primer día. Excelente en la mayoría de sus aspectos y un FPS totalmente recomendado, aún a día de hoy. Es un obligado para todo el mundo!

Acabo de completar el primer Half Life por primera vez y me ha parecido un juegazo de la hostia. La innovación que trajo este juego en su epoca no me la quiero ni imaginar. Jugarlo en su momento tuvo que ser algo completamente increible. Una pena no haberlo podido hacerlo. JUEGAZO!
